comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Inasmuch as I understand that technological advancement have its negative impact, the advantages outweighs the disadvantages. You can agree with me that owing to technological advancement, innovations such as the blockchain that is the reason for the creation of this forum that have created many jobs that you can attest to. The internet is another example as it has created more jobs than robots could take. Other examples include Youtube, Facebook, X and indeed various social media platforms where monetization is possible. Furthermore, digital and multi-level marketing have created more millionaires than you can imagine, thanks to technological advancement,Therefore, it is safe to say that conventional jobs are phasing out due to technological advancement and this in turn, create new jobs which are even more in number and in pay.

Oyibo don creat plenty robots to help man kind to solve many problem or treduce stress, but in the other way round go affect negatively.Nothing bad with AI or robot getting advancement in the country, how many head wey oyinbo dem get wey you say e no go affect them but e go come affect us. Aren't we all humans, we need to let go of that mentality or we can't achieve what they're achieving. The jobs wey you think say Robot go get, no forget say some of this Robot are going to to be manual wey be say dem go need operating and also dem go need maintenance so na job wey humans go dey do be dat. Robots go dey make us too relax, lazy and dependable on them and na the only thing wey I fit say na the negativity be dat but the rest are manageable. Instead of looking for our normal jobs wey we sabi, we go up our game and get skills in the ways of the new trend. Robots go actually make our Life better and instead of depending on man power, we go now depend on robot which equals more productivity. QuoteIf you be driver as a profession and driving robots come 9ja come take over all driving job, how you go do? Also if you be delivery man and robots come take over delivery how you go do? What about people wey say them be company or factory worker? Robots go replace man power there by leaving you with no choice. because your line of business don dey outdated and you Don dey old.Those robot go do better job pass you so why you go vex when the rebot makes life easier and now you fit go find another job wey robot never take control of or you you go learn skills for services of the robot or or robot related skills wey go dey helpful to you in the future. Physical business are getting outdated so maybe e go good when you lose that job so you fit dey reason things wey you fit do online to make money. The world dey evolves and one day most jobs wey we dey see people dey do, na robots go dey do am so e better you start to dey learn skills now to help you when robots begin dominate the workforce. Technical advancement brings civilization to a country as everything get dey digitized and not living like we're in the stone age.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Smile... Technology came to help man and not to suffer man. Op I understand what you means. But the disadvantages and advantages of this technology are all equal. In my university days early 2019, there was a serious debate on this issue and it was said, the matter what technology can not remove human labour from the working place mostly in the teaching field because at the end human is the who will still carry out the instructions. And if you really look at it from the agricultural revolution to the industrial revolution what we said in the class was real because in the agricultural revolution, landlord were using serf to cultivate farm land and when industrial revolution break out from the talented workers from the agricultural era, philosophers mostly those of the capitalist school thought were arguing that human labour would be fading away but industrial revolution took overy the world economy with the spearheading by capitalism, yet human labour is still needed everywhere till date. Op what you have created was discussed last week between me and my cousin in a moving vehicle. And I told him that, the disadvantages of dis new technology which is very big and the day when accident will take place it will be disastrous. We discussed all the things you mentioned. And one I told the worst is the cooking robot, the day when fire outbreak will happen, it will be very dangerous, because the robot is not a human being so to control the fire will be difficult. These robots are already programmed so human intelligent is still more than them. Though they are helpful. According to physics. " MACHINE is anything that reduces human effort". So they can reduce the effort of human beings but we should take precautions when using them. Machine, Robot and technology cannot replace humans in anything.
